title: Connection Device
description:
And before you ask, no. You can't play video games on this device...

Works (and is a bit more challenging) with the Multiple Widgets mods:
- Extended Ports
- Extended Batteries.

Also comes with 3 test missions. You can find them under "Computer Errors" in the bomb folder.

Module ID: KritConnectionDev

HTML Manual: https://ktane.timwi.de/HTML/Connection%20Device.html
PDF manual: https://ktane.timwi.de/PDF/Connection%20Device.pdf
